item.title: Koopman Operator Theory 2
item.author: Yoshihiko Susuki
item.description: It was a amazing week! I attended the 2nd edition of Koopman Operator Theory Workshop in Cres, Croatia. Great talks were presented from all of the participants. I met many colleagues in Koopman operators and dynamical systems. I really enjoyed the workshop in Moise Palace and the peaceful atomosphere in Cres (“no stress in Cres”). Looking forward to the 3rd edition in Kyoto!

item.title: SIAM DS meeting
item.author: Yoshihiko Susuki
item.description: It was a amazing week! We attended SIAM DS'25 (“Snowbird” meeting) in Denver. Great talks are presented from my team. I met many colleagues in Koopman operators and dynamical systems. I really enjoyed the meeting!

item.title: New website
item.author: Yoshihiko Susuki
item.description: I launched my new wesbsite at last!
